text: The Gerald R. Ford Presidential Library is the presidential library to honor and remember President of the United States Gerald R. Ford. The library was started in 1981. It is in Ann Arbor, Michigan. ==Other websites== * Gerald R. Ford Presidential Library and Museum Ford Category:Buildings and structures in Michigan Category:Gerald Ford Category:University of Michigan campus Category:1981 establishments in the United States Category:1980s establishments in Michigan
title: Gerald R. Ford Presidential Library
